title: LF Top / JG - PLAT +
body:
Hello, I'm looking for a top and jungler sub and maybe permanent jungler if you're quite good. Our current jungler does not have the mechanics (is silver) and isn't as great as we would like but our synergy is very good with him. We're a bunch of high schoolers, but we're not twelvies or anything so don't worry about it.  

Must be at least plat and have Skype, we're quite serious but not over the top or serious-serious like trying to aim into professional, we just hope to and we will if we can. Preferably high plat - or low diamond, please realize your playing with some mid - low plats but despite our rank, I find that we're quite good at the game. (trying to be as modest as possible)

replies.body:
Hey man, 

IGN: Brussknopp
I'm a plat 5 jungle main. Looking for a ranked 5s team so add me if you need a sub :) 
Thanks
